title: Story Generator
description: A single-page web application that generates stories based on user input prompts.

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: To provide users with an interface to enter prompts and view generated stories.

state.name: promptText
state.description: Stores the text input by the user as a prompt for story generation.

state.name: generatedStories
state.description: An array that holds all the stories generated from different prompts.

interactions.result: Updates state with the user's input
Sends the prompt to the backend for story generation, updates generatedStories array and displays the new story

acceptance_criteria: The application must display a header with the title 'Story Generator'.
There should be an input field where users can type their story prompts.
A button labeled 'Generate Story' should be present next to or below the input field.
When the user clicks the 'Generate Story' button, the prompt is sent to the backend and a new story is generated and displayed on the page without reloading.
Generated stories are stored in an array and are not lost when a new story is generated.
